paragraphs.name: 81b3
paragraphs.text: Walking like a zombie through this thing.
These painful realities shape us. We can use them to make or break us. Sometimes in breaking us they make us.

paragraphs.name: 7f0c
paragraphs.text:
I still wish
you were around to
at least to watch me
bleed out.

I often wonder,
If you wonder
if I’m wondering
where you are?
paragraphs.name: c0e9
9e1a
paragraphs.text:
What sort of coward
creates a life
only to abandon it?
Forgive me Sister,
paragraphs.name: ae50

paragraphs.text: For it’s been months since we last exchanged. I am here today so you know that you are forgiven.
Forgive me for not sharing with you the Truth that has saved me, and made me whole. You no longer have to bleed out, you no longer have to cry out.
paragraphs.name: e102

virtuals.subtitle: For it’s been months since we last exchanged. I am here today so you know that you are forgiven.

content.subtitle: For it’s been months since we last exchanged. I am here today so you know that you are forgiven.

paragraphs.text: Powerful words, beautiful phrasing ❤
paragraphs.name: f66a

92a02341a745.title: Beauty is not long hair, skinny legs, tanned skin or perfect teeth.

paragraphs.text: Beauty is not long hair, skinny legs, tanned skin or perfect teeth. Believe me. Beauty is the face of who cried and now smiles, beauty is the scar on your knee since you fell when you were a kid. Beauty is the marks life leaves on us, all the kicks and the caresses the memories leave us.
paragraphs.name: b651

paragraphs.text: Beauty is letting yourself live.
paragraphs.name: 4a40

paragraphs.text: Yes, they absolutely do.
paragraphs.name: c1ec

paragraphs.text: This was a long time coming.
paragraphs.name: 6c1d

paragraphs.text: All gravy x thanks love
paragraphs.name: e053

virtuals.subtitle: This was a long time coming.

content.subtitle: This was a long time coming.

paragraphs.text: These painful realities shape us. We can use them to make or break us. Sometimes in breaking us they make us.
You have taken your pain, the arid harshness of the land, and allowed Wild flowers to bloom and give joy to others. That is a beautiful thing; to translate pain into inspiration.
paragraphs.name: e306

paragraphs.text: Mad love and support, Wild Flower.
paragraphs.name: cbfb

virtuals.subtitle: These painful realities shape us. We can use them to make or break us. Sometimes in breaking us they make us.

db6ffa6cddae.title: I’ve tried to type words here in response to these words that came from the very core and depth of…

paragraphs.text: I’ve tried to type words here in response to these words that came from the very core and depth of your soul. Every word I write seems inadequate and wooden in comparison to yours. So instead just know that my heart feels your heart and your hurt and each and every single word of this hit home. There would be a lot of hugs around the fire Wild Flower after this one. Xxxx
paragraphs.name: b4fc

paragraphs.name: c407

Forgive me father
for I have sinned,
it’s been 10 years
since my last confession.
